top10_tweets_like:
Using #rayshader to overlay a historical map with modern elevation data in 3D.

Everything done in #rstats with the exception of georeferencing the historical map, which was done with QGIS (tutorial referenced in gist).

Code (GH gist):
https://t.co/Z7y68Jm7oC https://t.co/uhCef1idfd

I hadn't noticed it before, but it turns out my TOSTER equivalence testing package in #Rstats has become popular enough to be incorporated into @JASPStats! It's great to see their commitment to provide both frequentist and Bayesian analyses. https://t.co/9HAhaY7T92

Was honoured to give my first keynote at #useR2020 yesterday on "Computational Reproducibility: from theory to practice"

Slides: https://t.co/WhOOBRqKhm
